source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Excel for Business Analysts Online Course
items.headline: Learn the Functions and Formulas you need to perform detailed Data Analysis in Excel from Excel experts Simon Sez IT

items.title: Excel Conditional Formatting Basics - The built in Features

Use the Highlight Cell Rules to highlight cells by comparing the cells' value to another value
